body_html:
@gunan @caisq Looks like the CMake presubmit is trying (and failing) to run bazel?! Did something change recently to make this the case?

(On the other hand, this builds locally for me without using Docker, so if you want to ignore the check and merge it anyway, that'd be splendid....)

body:
@gunan @caisq Looks like the CMake presubmit is trying (and failing) to run `bazel`?! Did something change recently to make this the case?

(On the other hand, this builds locally for me without using Docker, so if you want to ignore the check and merge it anyway, that'd be splendid....)
